overview:
JIM WANDREY is CFO of PlayFirst, Inc and manages the financial, legal, human resource and IT Functions of the company.

He brings extensive experience from the technology and business services industries to his role at PlayFirst.

He has held senior executive roles at a variety of fast-growing start-ups and publicly traded technology companies such as CFO at Telephia, which sold to the Nielsen Company in 2007 and CFO at NextLevel Communications where he let their IPP. Additionally, Jim served as corporate controller for AVID Technology and has held senior financial roles at Alcatel S.A. and Hewlett Packard Co.

Jim holds a BS from Boston College and an MBA from the University of Chicago.
